# Bullet List Standardization Test

This document tests bullet list marker standardization.

## Single-Level Lists

Different markers:

- Asterisk item 1

- Asterisk item 2

- Plus item 1

- Plus item 2

- Hyphen item 1

- Hyphen item 2

## Nested Lists

Mixed markers at different levels:

- Top level with asterisk
  - Second level with plus
    - Third level with hyphen
      - Fourth level back to asterisk

## Task Lists

Task lists with different markers:

- [ ] Unchecked with asterisk
- [x] Checked with asterisk
- [ ] Unchecked with plus
- [X] Checked with plus (capital X)
- [ ] Unchecked with hyphen
- [x] Checked with hyphen

## Mixed Content

Lists with code blocks and other elements:

- List item with `inline code`

- List item with more text that wraps over multiple lines when the formatter
  processes it

  Continuation paragraph in list item

  ```python

      pass
  ```

- Another list item with different marker
